name: jaiFR
short_description: jaiFR is a web based newsfeed reader supporting RSS (0.9x, 1.0, 2.0) and Atom (2.0) formats. It can be used as a web application or the core functionalties of jaiFR can be integrated within applications in source format or as a library JAR distribution.
